articles.title: Tata Play becomes first firm to file confidential papers with Sebi for IPO - Economic Times
articles.description: A confidential filing, as the moniker suggests, allows a company to privately file a registration statement for an IPO with the regulator for review, delaying the public filing until much closer to the actual IPO date.
articles.content: New Delhi: Tata Play, formerly known as Tata Sky, has become the first Indian company to file a confidential pre-filing of offer document for its initial public offer (IPO) with market regulator Sebi… [+2188 chars]
